id.comment: What are the variables?

query.querystr: variable v; Select v

id.comment: What are the statements?

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s

id.comment: What are the while statements?

query.querystr: while w; Select w

id.comment: Which statement is the Parent of statement 11?

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent(s, 11)

id.comment: Which statements have statement 5 as its direct parent?

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent(5, s)

id.comment: Which assignments have statement 11 as its direct parent?

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Parent(11, a)

id.comment: Which statements have statement 6 as its direct parent?

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent(6, s)

id.comment: Which statement is the parent of statement 38?

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent(s, 38)

id.comment: Which statements are the direct/indirect parents of statement 28?

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent*(s, 28)

id.comment: Which statements have statement 12 as its direct/indirect parents?

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent*(12, s)

id.comment: Which statements are the direct/indirect parents of statement 5?

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent*(s, 5)

id.comment: Which statements have statement 24 as its direct/indirect parents?

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent*(24, s)

id.comment: Which statement follows statement 13?

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows(13, s)

id.comment: Which statement is followed by statement 25?

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows(s, 25)

id.comment: Which assignment is followed by statement 25?

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Follows(a, 25)

id.comment: Which statement follows statement 33?

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows(33, s)

id.comment: Which statement is followed by statement 22?

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows(s, 22)

id.comment: Which while statements directly/indirectly follow statement 6?

query.querystr: while w; Select w such that Follows*(6, w)

id.comment: Which statements directly/indirectly follow statement 17?

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows*(17, s)

id.comment: Which statements are directly/indirectly followed by statement 38?

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows*(s, 38)

id.comment: Which assignments are directly/indirectly followed by statement 38?

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Follows*(a, 38)

id.comment: Which assignments have subexpression 'm'?

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, _"m"_)

id.comment: Which assignments have 'm' on the left side and subexpression 'i' on the right side?

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a("m", _"i"_)

id.comment: Which variables appear on the left side of assignments with subexpression 'i' on the right side?

query.querystr: variable v; assign a; Select v pattern a(v, _"i"_)

id.comment: Which assignments have x on the left side?

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a("x", _)

id.comment: Which are all the assignment statements?

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_,_)

id.comment: Which variables are modified by statement 24?

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Modifies(24, v)

id.comment: Which assignment modifies variable 'z' ?

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Modifies (a, "z")

id.comment: Which while statement modifies variable 'z'?

query.querystr: while w; Select w such that Modifies (w, "z")

id.comment: Which statement modifies variable 'z'?

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Modifies (s, "z")

id.comment: Which assignments modifies some variable?

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Modifies (a, _)

id.comment: Which assignments modifies some variable?

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select a such that Modifies (a, v)

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Modifies (_, v)

id.comment: What are the while statements that is followed directly/indirectly by another while statements?

id.comment: What are the assignments that have variable v on left side and uses it at the same time?

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select a such that Uses(a,v) pattern a(v,_)

id.comment: What are the assignments that modifies v and uses it at the same time?

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select a such that Uses(a,v) such that Modifies(a,v)

id.comment: What are the variables that appear on the left side of an assignment with 'k' on the right side and it is used by some statements?
